function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Leakage of aerosols from isolation rooms to the corridor","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading airborne viruses to the corridor and public spaces","Mitigation":"Sealing and regular maintenance of isolation rooms to prevent aerosol leakage","Technologies":"Air pressure monitoring systems, air sealing materials","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, healthcare management"},{"Description":"Detection of weakly positive virus in corridor air and on exhaust grilles","Impact":"Possible existence of airborne viruses in the built environment","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation systems, air filtration, and regular surface disinfection","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters, UV-C air disinfection, surface disinfection sprays","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, infection control teams"},{"Description":"Low airborne concentration of SARS-CoV-2 in the hospital","Impact":"Risk of underestimating the presence of airborne viruses and their transmission potential","Mitigation":"Continuous air quality monitoring, regular testing, and validation of air sampling methods","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, real-time air testing equipment, standardized air sampling protocols","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, healthcare management"}]}
